s3games.engine.expr

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.engine.expr.Expression

  • public class Expression
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a named expression with named formal arguments. If it is single-line, it contains directly the respective expression class, otherwise it contains Expr_LIST. The name of this expression is stored as key in the map that holds all named expressions, it is not needed here.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String[] argNames
      the names of the arguments without $ sign - used as variable names when this expression is called
      Expr expr
      the list of expressions one for each line (or single expression for one-line expressions)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Expression(java.lang.String[] argNames)
      construct a new empty expression with the specified argument names

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLine(java.lang.String ln)
      append a new line at the end of this named expression
